alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 4:02PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Millard... northeastern Juab...southwestern Utah and southeastern Tooele Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 402 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles north of Delta, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Eureka, Lynndyl, Little Sahara State Park, Jericho, Lofgreen and Tintic Junction. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 107 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
